resources.string: It looks like the server is taking a long time to respond, please try again later
Check the entered data and repeat the request
A user with the same username already exists
Access to the resource is denied without authorization
Access to the resource is closed
Phone number can contain + sign and from 10 to 13 numbers
First name can contain only words
Last name can contain only words
Username must contain minimum 3 symbols include words, numbers or special signs [-,.:;!?*@_]
Password must contain minimum 8 symbols include words, numbers or special signs [-,.:;!?*@_]
